title: Bug 17932Emulated Coolbar do not resize when the last item on the row is removed
description: build 20020521 F11  Run the Car's coolbar example on:/Car/coolbartest/CoolBarIconTest.java2  Resize the window to be bigger3  Drag the last Item to the next row4  Remove the Item on index 5 (ie. the item that you just dragged)5  The coolbar do not resize, so there is a extra row empty where you justremoved the item.
